Post.title: svg
Post._content:
Adaptive Icon  gradle 
 SVG  .png 
```XML
<ImageView
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"          
 android:src="@drawable/xxxxxxxx" />
```

 build.gradle 
```
defaultConfig {
        vectorDrawables.useSupportLibrary = true
      }
```

```
compile 'com.android.support:appcompat-v7:26.1.0'
```
 ImageView 
```XML
<ImageView
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"          
 app:srcCompat="@drawable/xxxxxxxx" />
```
 SVG  Android 5.0 
 Activity  AppCompatActivity  Activity  Activity android.support.v7.widget.AppCompatImageView,  AppCompatActivity  ImageView  AppCompatImageView
 Textview  SVG  android:drawableRight  SVG AppCompatTextView  CompoundDrawable 5.0 ContextCompat.getDrawable  Drawable  setCompoundDrawablesWithIntrinsicBounds TextView [VectorCompatTextView](https://github.com/woxingxiao/VectorCompatTextView)
 ContextCompat.getDrawable  Drawable  XML ,  ImageView  background  backgroundCompat 
```
imageView.background = ContextCompat.getDrawable(context, R.drawable.xxxxxxxx)
```
 Linux  blog

Post.title: Android  Activity
Post._content:
Blog 

 Intent 

Intent  Intent

```java
  val intent = Intent(this, SecondActivity::class.java)
  intent.putExtra(".....", ......)
  startActivity(intent)
```
 url 
 url 
 url 
urlSchemaHostPathQueryParameter
```
Schema 

Host 

port 

pathName 

QueryParameter 
```
 intent.data uri
 uri  url 
```
URIuniform resource identifier
URLuniform resource locatorURIURLlocate
URNuniform resource namemailto:java-net@java.sun.com
URIURLURNURLURNURI

JavaURIURIURIURLschema
```
 intent.data  Uri 
 UrlDispatcher application  url
 Intent 
```XML
  <activity
     android:name=".ui.common.account.UserNameActivity"
     android:launchMode="singleTop">
     <intent-filter>
        <action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" />
        <category android:name="android.intent.category.BROWSABLE"/>
        <category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
        <data android:scheme="zhuyl" />
      </intent-filter>
  </activity>
```
 zhuyl  url 
 UrlDispatcher
```java
       var actions: MutableMap<String, (MutableMap<String, String>) -> Unit> = HashMap()
       val url = uri.host + uri.path
       val action = if (url.endsWith("/")) url.dropLast(1) else url

       val params: MutableMap<String, String> = HashMap()
       uri.queryParameterNames.forEach {
           val parameter = uri.getQueryParameter(it)
           params[it] = parameter
       }

       actions[action]?.invoke(params)
```
 action 

```
zhuyl://open_link/?url=https://baidu.com
```
 action  "open_link"

```java
actions["open_link"] = { params ->
   val intent = Intent(application, SecondActivity::class.java)
   val url = params["url"]
   intent.putExtra("url", url)
   intentToActivity(intent)
}
```
 url  activity

Blog
==
GoogleGoogle Develop DayGoogle Developersdeveloper.android.google.cn404
Material Design
ToolbarMaterial DesignAndroidAndroid 3.0AndroidActionBarActionBar  ActionBarSherlock  support library v7  AppCompatToolbarActionBar

ActivityAppCompatActionBarToolbarStyleThemeAppTheme parentTheme.AppCompat.Light.NoActionBarActionBarActivityXMLToolbar
toolbarMaterial DesignBilibiliAPPtoolbarGoogletoolbarviewAppbarLayout
AppBarLayout LinerLayoutViewGroupMaterial DesignApp BarAppbarLayoutToolbar
```XML
<android.support.design.widget.AppBarLayout
    xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content">
        <android.support.v7.widget.Toolbar
            android:id="@+id/toolbar"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:background="?attr/colorPrimary"
            android:minHeight="56dp"
            app:titleTextColor="@color/white">
        </android.support.v7.widget.Toolbar>
</android.support.design.widget.AppBarLayout>
```
Toolbar
```XML
<style name="CC.ToolbarWhiteTheme" parent="Widget.Design.CollapsingToolbar">
        <item name="android:textColorSecondary">@color/white</item>
</style>
```
Toolbar

Toolbartitleshare  icon
iOSAndroidiOStoolbarFloatingActionBariOS
titletoolbartoolbar.setTitle = iconbaseactivity
respackagemenulayoutstyleonCreateOptionsMenumenu

```Java
override fun onCreateOptionsMenu(menu: Menu): Boolean {
  menuInflater.inflate(R.menu.aaaaaa, menu)
  return super.onCreateOptionsMenu(menu)
}
```

Post.title: WebView   1
Post._content:
20182017 WebView
 WebView  JS  Android  WebView 
iOS  iOS  [YYText](https://github.com/ibireme/YYText) Android  TextView  SpannableString  SpannableStringBuilder 
SpannableString  SpannableStringBuilder  TextView 

![](https://ws1.sinaimg.cn/large/af31670dgy1fople7zmr8j20ma14u75o.jpg)
 TextView  SpannableString  span 
```java
        val textView = findViewById<TextView>(R.id.sample_text)
        val spannableStringBuilder = SpannableStringBuilder()

        val blueString = SpannableString("Hello")
        blueString.setSpan(ForegroundColorSpan(ContextCompat.getColor(this, R.color.colorPrimary)), 0, blueString.length, Spanned.SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_EXCLUSIVE)
        spannableStringBuilder.append(blueString)

        val redString = SpannableString("Hello")
        redString.setSpan(ForegroundColorSpan(ContextCompat.getColor(this, R.color.colorAccent)), 0, redString.length, Spanned.SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_EXCLUSIVE)
        spannableStringBuilder.append(redString)

        textView.text = spannableStringBuilder
```
 setSpan 
```Java
        setSpan(Object what, int start, int end, int flags)
```

 Object what  Span  ForegroundColorSpan
 int start  int end  spannableString 
 flag 
```
Spannable. SPAN_INCLUSIVE_EXCLUSIVE
Spannable. SPAN_INCLUSIVE_INCLUSIVE
Spannable. SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_EXCLUSIVE
Spannable. SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_INCLUSIVE
```
 span 
 span 
1. ImageSpan    Data Base64
2. clickableSpan
3.  Span
4.  TextView  View

Post.title: Android 7.0
Post._content:
Android O  Adaptive Icons 
 Android 4.4 Android 8.0
 Android 8.0  compileSdkVersion  targetSdkVersion  26 Android 7.0  Android N [Android 7.0 ](https://developer.android.com/about/versions/nougat/android-7.0-changes.html)
 Android 7.0  apk  Intent  apk 
```Java
val intent = Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW)
intent.flags = Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK
val file = File(Environment.getExternalStorageDirectory() + "/download/" + "app.apk")
val uri = Uri.fromFile(file)
intent.setDataAndType(uri, "application/vnd.android.package-archive")
```
 Android N Google 
```
 Android 7.0 Android  StrictMode API  file:// URI URI  intent  FileUriExposedException 
 content:// URI URI  FileProvider 
```


```
<manifest>
    ...
    <application>
        ...
        <provider
            android:name="android.support.v4.content.FileProvider"
            android:authorities="com.xxxx.fileprovider"
            android:exported="false"
            android:grantUriPermissions="true">
            ...
        </provider>
        ...
    </application>
</manifest>
```
resource xml file:
```
<paths xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
    <files-path name="my_docs" path="docs/"/>
</paths>
```
paths
**<root-path/> new File("/");**
**<files-path/> context.getFilesDir()**
**<cache-path/> context.getCacheDir()**
**<external-path/> Environment.getExternalStorageDirectory()**
**<external-files-path>context.getExternalFilesDirs()**
**<external-cache-path>getExternalCacheDirs()**


```
<provider
    android:name="android.support.v4.content.FileProvider"
    android:authorities="com.xxxx.fileprovider"
    android:exported="false"
    android:grantUriPermissions="true">
    <meta-data
    android:name="android.support.FILE_PROVIDER_PATHS"
    android:resource="@xml/provider_paths" />
</provider>
```
 install apk 
Uri  Uri.fromFile() 
```
val uri = if (SDK_INT >= N) {
  intent.addFlags(Intent.FLAG_GRANT_READ_URI_PERMISSION)
  FileProvider.getUriForFile(this, "com.xxxx.fileprovider", file)
  } else {
    Uri.fromFile(file)
  }
```

 Android 7.0  apk  Intent  apk 
```Java
val intent = Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW)
intent.flags = Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK
val file = File(Environment.getExternalStorageDirectory() + "/download/" + "app.apk")
val uri = Uri.fromFile(file)
intent.setDataAndType(uri, "application/vnd.android.package-archive")
```
 Android N Google 
```
 Android 7.0 Android  StrictMode API  file:// URI URI  intent  FileUriExposedException 
 content:// URI URI  FileProvider

```

</manifest>

Post.title: AndroidX
Post._content:
Android Developer 
```
AndroidX  Android  Jetpack 
AndroidX  Android AndroidX  Android  Android AndroidX 
```
 support lib  AndroidX
 AndroidX 
 Refactor -> Migrate to AndroidX
![refactor](https://s2.ax1x.com/2019/07/08/Zr0gaD.png)
![refactor](https://s2.ax1x.com/2019/07/08/ZrBeQ1.png)
 Refactor  index  AndroidX support  Androidx 
 gradle.properties 
```
android.useAndroidX=true
android.enableJetifier=true
```

```
android.useAndroidX trueAndroid  AndroidX  false
android.enableJetifier trueAndroid  AndroidX false
```
 AndroidX 

 AndroidX  RecycleView  CymChad:BaseRecyclerViewAdapterHelper AndroidX 
 kotlin  kotterKnife
kotterKnife  AndroidX) ButterKnife.kt 
```
public fun <V : View> AppCompatActivity.bindView(id: Int)
        : ReadOnlyProperty<AppCompatActivity, V> = required(id, viewFinder)
public fun <V : View> Fragment.bindView(id: Int)
        : ReadOnlyProperty<Fragment, V> = required(id, viewFinder)
public fun <V : View> Fragment.bindOptionalView(id: Int)
        : ReadOnlyProperty<Fragment, V?> = optional(id, viewFinder)
public fun <V : View> AppCompatActivity.bindOptionalView(id: Int)
        : ReadOnlyProperty<AppCompatActivity, V?> = optional(id, viewFinder)

private val AppCompatActivity.viewFinder: Finder<AppCompatActivity>
        get() = { findViewById(it) }
private val Fragment.viewFinder: Finder<Fragment>
        get() = { view!!.findViewById(it) }
```
 AndroidX  Fragment  Activity
 UI
